borrowShare(address,address).details: Debt token represents a share in total debt of given asset. This method calls balanceOf(_borrower) on that token.

params._borrower: wallet address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: balance of debt token of given user

calculateBorrowValue(address,address).details: It dynamically adds interest earned to borrowed amount In v1 result is always in 18 decimals, here it depends on oracle setup.

params._borrower: account for which calculation are done

returns._0: value of debt denominated in quote token, decimal depends on oracle setup.

calculateCollateralValue(address,address.details: It dynamically adds interest earned. Takes for account protected deposits as well. In v1 result is always in 18 decimals, here it depends on oracle setup.

params._borrower: account for which calculation are done

returns._0: value of collateral denominated in quote token, decimal depends on oracle setup.

calculateProfitableLiquidation(address,a.details: calculate profitable liquidation values, in case of bad debt, it will calculate max debt to cover based on available collateral.  Result returned by this method might not work for case, when full liquidation is required.

params._borrower: wallet address for which to read data
params._silo: Address of the silo

returns._0: balance of underlying tokens for the given `_borrower`

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

params._borrower: wallet address for which to read data
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns.aprs: The interest rate values in 18 decimals points. 10**18 is equal to 100% per year.

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.borrowAPR: The interest rate value in 18 decimals points. 10**18 is equal to 100% per year

params._borrower: account for which calculation are done
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: total amount of asset user needs to repay at provided timestamp

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.depositAPR: The interest rate value in 18 decimals points. 10**18 is equal to 100% per year.

params._borrower: account for which calculation are done
params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
Address of the silo

returns.daoFee: The total fee for the DAO in 18 decimals points
returns.daoFeeReceiver: The address of the DAO fee receiver
returns.deployerFee: The total fee for the deployer in 18 decimals points
returns.deployerFeeReceiver: The address of the deployer fee receiver

params._silo: Address of the silo
Address of the silo

returns.lt: The LT value in 18 decimals points

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.ltv: The LTV for the borrower in 18 decimals points

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.maxLtv: The maximum LTV ratio configured for the silo in 18 decimals points

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns.liquidity: based on contract state (without interest, fees)

params._siloIncentivesController: Address of the Silo incentives controller

returns.programsNames: Names of all programs in Silo incentives controller

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.userLT: The LT for the borrower in 18 decimals points, returns 0 if no debt

params._silo: Address of the silo

returns.userLTV: The LTV for the borrower in 18 decimals points

params._borrowers: list of borrowers with corresponding silo addresses

returns.healths: The LTs and LTVs for the borrowers in 18 decimals points, returns 0 for users with no debt

params._borrowers: list of borrowers with corresponding silo addresses

returns.usersLTs: The LTs for the borrowers in 18 decimals points, returns 0 for users with no debt

getUtilization(address).details: [v1 NOT compatible] Utilization is calculated current values in storage so it does not take for account earned interest and ever-increasing total borrow amount. It assumes `Model.DP()` = 100%.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns.version: The version of the contract in format "SiloLens 3.17.0", "legacy" if not implement IVersioned, "Not a contract" if not a contract.

params._borrower: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: TRUE if user has position in any asset

params._borrower: wallet address for which to read data

returns._0: TRUE if user borrowed any amount of any asset, otherwise FALSE

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

liquidity(address).details: Amount of token that is available for borrowing.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data
silo where borrower has debt

returns.collateralToLiquidate: underestimated amount of collateral liquidator will get
returns.debtToRepay: debt amount needed to be repay to get `collateralToLiquidate`
returns.fullLiquidation: TRUE if position has to be fully liquidated
returns.sTokenRequired: TRUE, when liquidation with underlying asset is not possible because of not enough liquidity

protocolFees(address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account. In SiloLens v1 this was total (ever growing) amount, in this one is since last withdraw.

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of fees earned by protocol to date since last withdraw

totalBorrowAmount(address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns._0: amount of asset that has been borrowed

totalBorrowShare(address).details: Debt token represents a share in total debt of given asset

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

totalDeposits(address).details: It reads directly from storage so interest generated between last update and now is not taken for account

params._silo: Silo address from which to read data

returns.totalDeposits: amount of all deposits made for given asset

borrowShare(address,address).notice: Get debt token balance of a user

calculateBorrowValue(address,address).notice: Calculate value of borrowed asset by user

calculateCollateralValue(address,address.notice: Calculate value of collateral asset for user

collateralBalanceOfUnderlying(address,ad.notice: Get underlying balance of all deposits of silo asset of given user including "protected" deposits, with interest

collateralOnlyDeposits(address).notice: Get amount of protected asset token that has been deposited to Silo

debtBalanceOfUnderlying(address,address).notice: Get amount of debt of underlying token for given user

getAPRs(address[]).notice: Calculates current deposit and borrow interest rates (bulk method).

getBorrowAmount(address,address).notice: Calculates current borrow amount for user with interest

getDepositAmount(address,address).notice: Calculates current deposit (with interest) for user without protected deposits

getFeesAndFeeReceivers(address).notice: Retrieves the fee details in 18 decimals points and the addresses of the DAO and deployer fee receivers

getLtv(address,address).notice: Retrieves the loan-to-value (LTV) for a specific borrower

getSiloIncentivesControllerProgramsNames.notice: Get names of all programs in Silo incentives controller

getUserLT(address,address).notice: Retrieves the LT for a specific borrower

getUserLTV(address,address).notice: Retrieves the loan-to-value (LTV) for a specific borrower

getUsersHealth((address,address)[]).notice: Retrieves the LT and LTV for a specific borrowers

getUsersLT((address,address)[]).notice: Retrieves the LT for a specific borrowers

getUtilization(address).notice: Calculates fraction between borrowed amount and the current liquidity of tokens for given asset denominated in percentage

getVersion(address).notice: Retrieves the version of the contract

hasPosition(address,address).notice: Check if user has position (collateral, protected or debt) in any asset in a market (both silos are checked)

inDebt(address,address).notice: Check if user is in debt

isSolvent(address,address).notice: this is backwards compatible method, you can use `_silo.isSolvent(_borrower)` directly.

liquidity(address).notice: this is backwards compatible method, you can use `_silo.getLiquidity()`

protocolFees(address).notice: Get amount of fees earned by protocol to date

totalBorrowAmount(address).notice: Get amount of asset that has been borrowed

totalBorrowAmountWithInterest(address).notice: returns total borrow amount with interest dynamically calculated at current block timestamp

totalDeposits(address).notice: Get amount of underlying asset that has been deposited to Silo

totalDepositsWithInterest(address).notice: returns total deposits with interest dynamically calculated at current block timestamp
